Alert Name: bush
Paulson: Economy to grow this year
Treasury Secretary, speaking at IMF meeting, also U.S. must avoid protectionism.
04/14/07 12:18 PM, EDT
Treasury Secretary Henry Paulson said Saturday the U.S. economy was set to pick up steam later this year, and pledged to fight any effort at trade protectionism that could slow growth.
